participant_1.background:

i am from mexico.
i really love plants.
I wake up early and listen to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
i won a beauty pageant one time but did not feel like it was worth the effort.

participant_2.background:
I went to a comedy club in a new city and laughed so hard that I cried.
I met a lot of new people at the welding classes I've been taking.
I'm lucky to have a family that supports me and my hobbies, even if they don't understand them.
i miss my dad.
I am single because my time is devoted to rescuing animals.

content.text: Hey there how is it going?
Not bad, not bad. Just came back from a welding class. How about you?
I am good. I woke up early and listened to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
Wow, that's interesting. I've never heard of Ween before.
They are a band from Pennsylvania. Really great music. You should check them out sometime.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. So what do you do for fun?
I like to rescue animals. I'm single because all of my time is devoted to them.
That's really great. I'm sure the animals appreciate it.
They do. I love getting to know them and helping them.
That's awesome. I'm glad you have something you're passionate about.
Thanks. I'm glad you're passionate about music.
Yeah, I really love it. It's a great way to express myself.
I can imagine. It's always nice to have something that you can do to relax and let loose.
